member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.Component.Predecessor
member.summary: Links to equivalent Component from PerformanceReport based on the same template for the previous period, i.e allows for reporting of indicators accross long periods.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.Component.PerfIndexWeight
member.summary: Only applies if PerfIndexCalculationMethod of parent Component is 'WeightedChildren'

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.Component.Area
member.summary: In cases were the Component is specific to an area.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.Component.DataSource
member.summary: Indicates how the indicator values will be sourced.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.Component.DataLimitations
member.summary: Identifies any limitation with the indicator data, including factors the might be beyond the departments control.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentProgressReport.SkipReportingThisPeriod
member.summary: If true, indicates reporting is skipped for this particular period.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.Name
member.summary: Unique name for this type of component.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.Caption
member.summary: What will be displayed to the user for this type of component.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.IsIndicator
member.summary: If true, indicates that the component represents an indicator.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.ShowInAdminTree
member.summary: If false, will not display this component when viewing as a regular user.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.ProgressReportingRequired
member.summary: If true, a Progress Reporting for this component and all its child Components is done at this level.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.ComponentType.ProgressDetailsSubForm
member.summary: Name of the form used to display Component progress details.

member.name: P:Boxfusion.Smartgov.Epm.Domain.IndicatorDefinition.WhatMeasured
member.summary: Identifies whether the indicator is measuring inputs, activities, outputs, outcomes or impact, or some other dimension of performance such as efficiency, economy or equity.
